name: Blundstone Renovating Cream 50ml
description: Feed and water your Blunnies, and they'll reward you with years of faithful service. This renovating cream nourishes and conditions the leather in your Blundstones, keeping them from drying out and helping to maintain their colour and finish.Heavily pigmented to maintain colour and finish.Test in an inconspicuous area prior to full application, as it may change the appearance of certain leathers.
